tool.name: blast wrapper

param.label: -i/--input_fasta_fp: path to the input fasta file
param.name: input_fasta_fp

param.label: -r/--refseqs_fp: path to blast database as a fasta file
param.name: refseqs_fp

param.label: -n/--num_seqs_per_blast_run: number of sequences passed to each blast call - useful for very large sequence collections [default: 1000]
param.name: num_seqs_per_blast_run

tool.help: This script is a functionally-limited interface to the qiime.util.qiime_blast_seqs function, primarily useful for testing purposes. Once that function has been integrated into qiime as the primary blast interface it will move to PyCogent. An expanded version of this command line interface may replace the script functionality of cogent.app.blast at that point. This is a utility program, which returns BLAST results.
